quest.name: An Illuminati Incident
journal: Slowfix has the look of a goblin who is about to ask a favor.

Though you have already fulfilled your part of the bargain in eliminating the golems, Slowfix begs you to oblige him one more favor: rescue his friend who has ventured into Illuminati-held territory. Make your way to the Makers' Quarter and find the reckless goblin before it is too late.

Slowfix's goblin friend is revealed to be none other than Brayflox; no sooner do you locate her than Illuminati forces appear, bent on bloody retribution for their stolen cheese recipe. Together with Alphinaud and Y'shtola, you succeed in putting the enemy to rout, and Brayflox resumes scavenging for junk without skipping a beat.
Whatever the feud between Brayflox and the Illuminati was about, the end result is that you have fulfilled Slowfix's request. Return to Idyllshire and report your success to the goblin.
Slowfix thanks you profusely for rescuing Brayflox. Her antics, it would seem, are considered offbeat even by goblin standards.
objectives: Search for Slowfix's friend in the Makers' Quarter.

dialogue.name: SLOWFIX
dialogue.text: Pssshkohhh... Uplanders helped gobbieflock, earned right to be citizens of Idyllshire. But Slowfix must ask another favor.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: ...Another favor, you say?

dialogue.name: SLOWFIX
dialogue.text: Short time ago, dear friend of Slowfix ventured into Illuminati territory.

dialogue.name: SLOWFIX
dialogue.text: Illuminati are nasty goblins, show no mercy even towards gobbiekin. Slowfix fears for friend's life. Please find friend before Illuminati do.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: I am suddenly taken by a sense of foreboding.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Be that as it may, we cannot turn a blind eye. Let us make haste and find Slowfix's friend.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: I'm pleased to report that my golems obediently crumbled at my command.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Of all the luck, one of my golems was not receptive to the password, and tried to pummel me bloody. Thankfully, I managed to dance clear of its fists and strike it down.

dialogue.name: SLOWFIX
dialogue.text: Illuminati are nasty goblins, show no mercy even towards gobbiekin. Slowfix fears for friend's life. Please find friend before Illuminati do.

dialogue.name: BRAYFLOX
dialogue.text:
Pshhh... Shkohhh...
Goodly uplander! Long time no eyecatch! What is bringing uplander here?

dialogue.name: BRAYFLOX
dialogue.text: <gasp> Does uplander have lustyeyes for junk of Brayflox? Uplander must not be touching junk of Brayflox! Brayflox is finding junk first!

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: I knew I recognized that voice... Greetings, Brayflox. It has been a while.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Forgive us for interrupting your work, but Captain Wheiskaet gave me to understand that you are marked by the Illuminati. This happens to be Illuminati-held territory. Is it wise to be here?

dialogue.name: BRAYFLOX
dialogue.text: Pshhhawww! Brayflox eat Illuminati for sunupses!

dialogue.name: QUICKTHINXALLTHOUGHTS
dialogue.text: Pshhhkohhh... Who eats who for sunupses?

dialogue.name: BRAYFLOX
dialogue.text: Uwaaah!

dialogue.name: QUICKTHINXALLTHOUGHTS
dialogue.text: Brayflox Alltalks! Unwise you are to come here after dirty-taking secret knowings of cheesemake from Illuminati!

dialogue.name: BRAYFLOX
dialogue.text: Brayflox did no unright! Cheese recipe is gobbie birthright!

dialogue.name: QUICKTHINXALLTHOUGHTS
dialogue.text: Save tongueflaps for trading in deathpit!

dialogue.name: QUICKTHINXALLTHOUGHTS
dialogue.text: Pray to gobfathers, for punishment is neartimes!

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: It appears we have no choice...

dialogue.name: BRAYFLOX
dialogue.text: Psssheehee! Illuminati no match for furious gobfists of Brayflox!

dialogue.name: BRAYFLOX
dialogue.text: More junk is awaiting Brayflox muchly! Brayflox is taking leave of uplanders!

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Being embroiled in a cheese war was the last thing I expected coming to Sharlayan. At any rate, we have fulfilled Slowfix's request. Let us return with the good tidings and be on our way.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: So that was the famous Brayflox... I have newfound respect for the Company of Heroes. That a motley crew such as theirs could achieve the feats they did bespeaks unwavering solidarity.

dialogue.name: SLOWFIX
dialogue.text: Uplanders are back! Did uplanders find friend of Slowfix?

dialogue.name: SLOWFIX
dialogue.text: Pshkohhh... Time has not cured recklessness of Brayflox. Without help from uplanders, Brayflox would now be dead gobbie. Slowfix owes uplanders debt of gratitude!

dialogue.name: SLOWFIX
dialogue.text: Slowfix and Brayflox are joined by unseverable gobbiebond. If Slowfix had known that uplanders are friends of Brayflox, Slowfix would have welcomed uplanders to gobbieflock at first meeting!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: I had known that Y'shtola was capable, but to invoke such potent magicks so effortlessly... I must needs redouble my efforts if I am to approach her level of mastery.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: One does not simply “drift” in the Lifestream; it is a constant struggle to hold on to your very essence. The experience has hardened me in ways I can ill explain.

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Protect Brayflox!

dialogue.name: BRAYFLOX
dialogue.text: Pssshkoh! Brayflox showy-do Illuminati gobbie trick or two!

dialogue.name: QUICKTHINX
dialogue.text: To deathpit with you!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Whatever this is about, Brayflox needs our help!

dialogue.name: QUICKTHINX
dialogue.text: Tremble before might of Illuminati!

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Whence came all these bombs!?

dialogue.name: BRAYFLOX
dialogue.text: Spill bladder not over unstrong firebooms of Illuminati!

dialogue.name: BRAYFLOX
dialogue.text: M-More lentfists!?

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Yet more of them! At this rate...

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Now seems as good a time as any...

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: I shall invoke a spell!

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Pray keep the enemy at bay!

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: It...it is done...

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Amazing... How did you learn such a potent spell?

dialogue.name: BRAYFLOX
dialogue.text: Huzzah! Uplander is Brayflox's ironfist!

dialogue.name: BRAYFLOX
dialogue.text: Shkoh... Brayflox is remembering busydeal...

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: My strength is spent...

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: I was...unready...
